trans-unit.source: Defines the basic functionality that represents the personalization data for a page.
trans-unit.target: 定义表示页的个性化设置数据的基本功能。

trans-unit.source: Classes that derive from this base class contain the actual implementation for managing, applying, and extracting personalization data.
trans-unit.target: 从此基类派生的类包含用于管理、 应用，以及提取个性化数据的实际实现。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization> class makes use of personalization state with a reference to PersonalizationState.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization>类将使用的个性化状态对 PersonalizationState 的引用。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization>

trans-unit.source: If a developer writes a custom PersonalizationState implementation, a custom <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationProvider> must also be written.
trans-unit.target: 如果开发人员编写的自定义的 PersonalizationState 实现自定义<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationProvider>必须编写。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationProvider>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationProvider> instances are responsible for creating and consuming PersonalizationState instances.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationProvider>实例负责创建和使用 PersonalizationState 实例。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationProvider>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationState"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationState"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: The object created by this constructor manages the state for Web Parts controls that are managed by the specified <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control.
trans-unit.target: 此构造函数创建的对象管理的管理的 Web 部件控件的状态由指定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"></xref> that manages Web Parts controls that have personalization data.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"> </xref>管理具有个性化数据的 Web 部件控件。

trans-unit.source: The webPartManager parameter is .
trans-unit.target: The webPartManager parameter is .

trans-unit.source: When overridden, applies personalization data to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"></xref> control associated with the personalization state instance.
trans-unit.target: 重写时，将应用到的个性化数据<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"></xref>与个性化状态实例关联的控件。

trans-unit.source: The associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control was a parameter in the constructor that created the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationState> object.
trans-unit.target: 关联<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>控件已创建的构造函数中的参数<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationState>对象。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationState> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>

trans-unit.source: When overridden, applies personalization data to the specified Web Parts control.
trans-unit.target: 重写时，适用于指定的 Web 部件控件个性化数据。

trans-unit.source: This is the abstract definition of the method used to apply personalization data to a Web Parts control.
trans-unit.target: 这是方法的用于将个性化数据应用到 Web 部件控件的抽象定义。

trans-unit.source: The Web Parts control to which personalization data is applied.
trans-unit.target: Web 部件控件数据应用到哪些个性化设置。

trans-unit.source: When overridden, extracts personalization information from the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"></xref> control associated with the current personalization state.
trans-unit.target: 重写时，提取从个性化信息<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"></xref>与当前的个性化状态相关联的控件。

trans-unit.source: This is the abstract definition of a method used to extract personalization information from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control associated with the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationState> object.
trans-unit.target: 这是用来提取个性化信息的方法的抽象定义<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>与关联控件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationState>对象。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationState> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>

trans-unit.source: The associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> was a parameter in the constructor that was used to create the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationState> object.
trans-unit.target: 关联<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>已用于创建构造函数中的参数<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationState>对象。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationState> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>

trans-unit.source: When overridden, extracts personalization data from the specified Web Parts control.
trans-unit.target: 重写时，从指定的 Web 部件控件提取个性化数据。

trans-unit.source: This is the abstract definition of the method used to extract personalization data from a Web Parts control.
trans-unit.target: 这是方法的用于从 Web 部件控件提取个性化数据的抽象定义。

trans-unit.source: The Web Parts control from which personalization data is extracted.
trans-unit.target: Web 部件控件的个性化从提取数据。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the authorization filter for the specified Web Parts control.
trans-unit.target: 检索指定的 Web 部件控件的授权筛选器。

trans-unit.source: This method returns the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AuthorizationFilter%2A> string for a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control before an instance of it is created.
trans-unit.target: 此方法返回<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AuthorizationFilter%2A>的字符串<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控制创建它的实例之前。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AuthorizationFilter%2A>

trans-unit.source: This method should return `null` if there is no personalized value for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AuthorizationFilter%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 此方法应返回`null`没有个性化的值是否<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AuthorizationFilter%2A>属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AuthorizationFilter%2A>

trans-unit.source: The Web Parts control set does not implement any default behavior for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AuthorizationFilter%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Web 部件控件集不实现任何默认行为<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AuthorizationFilter%2A>属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AuthorizationFilter%2A>

trans-unit.source: The property is provided so that a developer can assign an arbitrary string value to a custom <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control; this property can be checked by subscribing to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.AuthorizeWebPart> event on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control on a page to determine whether the control can be added to the page.
trans-unit.target: 以便开发人员可以将任意字符串值分配给自定义提供该属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控件; 由订阅检查此属性可以<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.AuthorizeWebPart>上的事件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>页来确定是否可以将控件添加到页面上的控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.AuthorizeWebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: The ID of the Web Parts control from which the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AuthorizationFilter*> is retrieved.
trans-unit.target: 向其的 Web 部件控件的 ID<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AuthorizationFilter*>检索。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AuthorizationFilter*>

trans-unit.source: The authorization filter string for a Web Parts control.
trans-unit.target: Web 部件控件的授权筛选器字符串。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether any personalization information has changed.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示是否已更改个性化的任何信息。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization> class checks this property to determine whether the personalization state needs to be written back to the underlying data store.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization>类将检查此属性以确定是否需要重新写入到基础数据存储区的个性化设置状态。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if any personalization state instance has changed (is "dirty"); otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果已更改任何个性化状态实例 （为"脏"）;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: When overridden, gets a value that indicates whether any personalization state was extracted by a state instance.
trans-unit.target: 重写时，获取一个值，该值指示是否任何个性化状态被提取状态实例。

trans-unit.source: This property is an abstract definition of a property that can be called to determine whether any personalization state was extracted by a state instance.
trans-unit.target: 此属性是一个属性，可以调用以确定是否有个性化设置状态被状态实例提取的抽象定义。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if any personalization state was extracted by a state instance; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果任何个性化状态被提取的状态实例;，否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Marks the current personalization state as having changed.
trans-unit.target: 将标记为已更改的当前个性化设置状态。

trans-unit.source: Classes that inherit from <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationState> can use this method to mark themselves as having changed (or being "dirty"), thus indicating the need to reserialize and save personalization state.
trans-unit.target: 继承自的类<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationState>可以使用此方法将自身标记为已发生更改 （或"脏"），从而指明需要重新序列化和保存个性化设置状态。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationState>

trans-unit.source: When overridden, marks a Web Parts control as having changed.
trans-unit.target: 重写时，将标记为已更改的 Web 部件控件。

trans-unit.source: This is an abstract definition of the method used to indicate that a Web Parts control has changed (is "dirty").
trans-unit.target: 这是用来指示已更改 Web 部件控件的方法的抽象定义 （为"脏"）。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> class exposes methods (which in turn call this method) that can be used by developers to mark a Web Parts control as "dirty," thus indicating the need to reserialize and save personalization state.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>类公开的方法 （其反过来调用此方法） 开发人员可以用于将标记为"脏"Web 部件控件，从而指明需要重新序列化和保存个性化设置状态。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: The Web Parts control to be marked as having changed.
trans-unit.target: 要标记为已更改的 Web 部件控件。

trans-unit.source: When overridden, marks the associated <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"></xref> control as having changed.
trans-unit.target: 重写时，将标记关联<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"></xref>为已更改的控件。

trans-unit.source: This is the abstract definition of the method used to indicate that the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> instance associated with the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationState> instance is now considered to have changed (is "dirty").
trans-unit.target: 这是用来指示的方法的抽象定义<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>与关联实例<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationState>实例现在被视为已更改 （为"脏"）。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationState> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization> class exposes a protected method (which in turn calls this method) that can be used by developers to mark the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control as "dirty," thus indicating the need to reserialize and save personalization state.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization>类公开受保护的方法 （这又会调用此方法），开发人员可以用于将标记关联<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>从而指明需要重新序列化和保存个性化设置状态为"脏"的控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization>

trans-unit.source: Verifies that the specified Web Parts control is valid.
trans-unit.target: 验证指定的 Web 部件控件有效。

trans-unit.source: This method verifies that `webPart` is a valid Web Parts control.
trans-unit.target: 此方法验证`webPart`是有效的 Web 部件控件。

trans-unit.source: The base class verifies that `webPart` is not `null` and is managed by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control associated with the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationState> object.
trans-unit.target: 基类验证`webPart`不`null`和由<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>与关联控件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationState>对象。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationState> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>

trans-unit.source: Classes that derive from <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationState> should validate Web Parts controls inside of any methods that work with <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> instances.
trans-unit.target: 派生自的类<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationState>应验证 Web 部件控件内使用任何方法<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>实例。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationState>

trans-unit.source: This ensures that standalone <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> instances do not have state changes accidentally written into the personalization data for a page.
trans-unit.target: 这可确保该独立<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>实例没有意外地将写入个性化数据页的状态更改。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: The Web Parts control to be validated.
trans-unit.target: 要验证的 Web 部件控件。

trans-unit.source: webPart is not currently managed by the associated with the .
trans-unit.target: webPart当前不由管理与关联 。

trans-unit.source: webPart is
trans-unit.target: webPart 是

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"></xref> control currently associated with the personalization state instance.
trans-unit.target: 获取对<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"></xref>当前与个性化状态实例关联的控件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control is the object used as a parameter for the constructor that creates the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationState> object.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>控件是用作创建构造函数的参数对象<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationState>对象。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationState> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"></xref> associated with the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationState"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"> </xref>与关联<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationState"> </xref>。
